author: ituckey
title: Premier League wonderkids of the future? Meet ten teenagers set to be targeted by top English clubs and continental rivals
text:
EFL TEEN IDOLS Premier League wonderkids of the future? Meet ten teenagers set to be targeted by top English clubs and continental rivals 
SunSport looks at starlets from around the world who could face a tug-of-war for their signatures as early as this summer By SUNSPORT REPORTERS 30th March 2017, 11:51 pm Updated: 30th March 2017, 11:52 pm
